title: Writer, actor and comedian Charlie Higson to visit Hanley Castle High School (Worcestershire County Council) ...
text: ( Source : Worcestershire County Council ) Author Charlie Higson will make a visit to Hanley Castle High School as part of a promotional tour for the final book in his acclaimed ' The Enemy ' series thanks to the innovative work of
